title: Amazon EventBridge to AWS Lambda
description: This template deploys a Lambda function that is triggered by an EventBridge rule. In this example, the rule filters for specific attributes in the event before invoking the function.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This template deploys a Lambda function that is triggered by an EventBridge rule. In this example, the rule filters for specific attributes in the event before invoking the function.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.headline: Presented by Daniele Frasca
authors.name: Daniele Frasca
authors.bio: I am Daniele Frasca serverless enthusiast. I build and architect serverless applications at scale.
